Widowmaker

Widowmaker is the perfect assassin, armed with a precise rifle, venom mines, and the ability to grapple to sniping spots in the blink of an eye.

Damage

Annecy, France

Abilities

Widow's KissGrappling HookVenom MineInfra-Sight

Widow's Kiss

Automatic assault weapon. Hold for long-ranged sniper weapon.

Grappling Hook

Launch a hook that pulls you towards a ledge.

Venom Mine

Launch a poison trap.

Infra-Sight

Provide your team with a view of the enemy's location.

Keys displayed are defaults for PC. They are configurable in game.

Origin Story

A lifetime ago, Amélie Lacroix, wife of an Overwatch agent, was kidnapped by Talon. Shortly after returning home, she killed her husband and vanished. Now, “Widowmaker” is Talon's most effective weapon, a patient, ruthlessly efficient operative who rarely shows emotion and remorse, and revels only in the moment of the kill.
